proj78.xml
Class XmlException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              proj78.xml.XmlException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
XmlParseException
public class XmlException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while working with the DOM.

Author:
K.A., copyright (c) 2008
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int DOMSTRING_SIZE_ERR
          (Not used) A range of text did not fit into a DOMString.
static int FILE_IO_ERR
          (non-DOM) An error occurred during an I/O operation by a parser or serializer.
static int HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR
          An attempt was made to insert a node somewhere it does not belong, or where it is not permitted.
static int INDEX_SIZE_ERR
          An index or size was negative or greater than the allowed value.
static int INUSE_ATTRIBUTE_ERR
          An attempt was made to add an attribute that is already in use elsewhere.
static int INVALID_CHARACTER_ERR
          An invalid or illegal XML character was specified.
static int MALFORMED_XML_ERR
          (non-DOM) Badly formed XML was supplied to the parser.
static int NO_DATA_ALLOWED_ERR
          Data was specified for a node that does not support data.
static int NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR
          An attempt was made to modify a node that is read-only.
static int NOT_FOUND_ERR
          A non-existent node was referenced.
static int NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR
          A requested object or operation is not supported by the implementation.
static int WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR
          A node was used in a document other than the one that created it.

          Constructs a new XmlException given the detail message.

FILE_IO_ERR

public static final int FILE_IO_ERR
(non-DOM) An error occurred during an I/O operation by a parser or serializer. Allows for application code to use unchecked exception handling for I/O errors.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

XmlException

public XmlException(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                    int errorCode)
Constructs a new XmlException given the detail message and error code.

Parameters:
errorMessage - a message detailing the error that occured.
errorCode - an integer error code; one of the named error constants.
